attributes.action: Send taxpayers our bank share certificates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As our tax was used to purchase shares in many of the banks it seems only fair that taxpayers should have share certificates to trade as we wish.

I for one did not wish my tax to be used in this way and resent the fact that I am effectively in debt as a result of your Government bailing out banks.  As you chose to use my tax to do this I would like my shares please, that way I and all the other taxpayers get a vote at shareholders meetings and will have a say in the future governance of the said banks.
